뉴비들을 농락하기위한 게임
초보 살인마로 시작한다면 티배깅과 삿대질, 후레쉬로 눈뽕당하기, 캠핑하면 마지막 채팅창에서 fuc* you camper라면서  욕처먹는건 일상이 될 정도의 고인물게임.
초보 생존마로 시작하게 된다면 살인마가 집중적으로 노렸을때 아무스킬도 없고 맵 이해도 조차없어서 그대로 갈고리행으로 직행
생존자나 살인마나 좋은 스킬을 얻기위해서는 블러드 포인트가 굉장히 많이 필요함.
다른 캐릭터의 스킬을 자신이 선호하는 캐릭터에 넣기 위해서는 너무 오랜시간동안 플레이 해야됨
아이템과 아이템 보조도구는 랜덤으로 얻더라도 최소한 스킬만은 원하는걸 살수 있게 해줬으면 할정도
한캐릭터의 레벨을 30 이상을 찍어야 얻는 전승 퍽을 찍어야 다른 캐릭으로도 그 스킬을 사용할수 있는게 아니라 얻을 기회가 생긴다는점도 고인물과 뉴비의 차이를 벌리는것중하나.
지금은 할인기간으로 초보 유입이 많지만 대부분은 위에 적어놓은대로 고인물들과의 차이로 인해 접을 가능성이 너무높음.
신전 시스템을 이용해도 너무 느린 스킬입수 및 스킬레벨 상승
주마다 4개의 스킬이 나오지만 원하는 스킬을 얻기 힘듬
스킬만이 게임의 전부는 아니지만 최소한 입문자들 숨통은 트여줘야 한다고 생각합니다.
어느정도 스킬과 아이템을 입수하고 나면 재미있어질 만한 게임이지만 입수할때까지의 시간이 게임에 재미를 붙일 시간과 비례할지 누구도 장담못함
살인마의 경우 살인마마다 선호 스킬이 다르지만  클래식 스킬들(한방퍽 포함) 몇가지와 루인,과 같은 스킬들을 얻기 위한 시간이 오래걸림. 생각보다 토템 위치, 판자갯수나 발전기 위치, 개구멍 위치같은 운과 같은요소로 인해  게임이 터질때가 많이나옴.
살인마는 살인마들 간 너프와 버프로 밸런싱 조절이 시급해보임
생존자의 경우 원하는 스킬이 현 1티어 스킬인 칼찌, 스프린트, 자힐, 시계 or 불굴 or 데드하드 일경우 최소 캐릭터 4개는 육성해야함.
옛날보다 블러드 포인트 벌기 쉽게 일퀘가 있고, 신전에서는 이미 구입한 전승퍽의 경우 죠스바를 블포로 환산해준다지만 저런 스킬들 얻는데 쓰는걸 비교한다면 생각보다 힘듬.
아이템과 스킬을 따로 살수 있게 해줘야 뉴비들 유입이 쉬워질듯.
살인마 입장에서는 칼찌, 스프린트 많아진다 생각도 많이 들겠지만 최소한 뉴비들 재미 붙일정도는 되야한다고 생각함.
很不错的游戏，很有代入感，推荐大家开黑一起玩。

Play with friends and you're more than likely going to have a lot of fun whether you win or lose. Playing with friends also can help you tolerate the bugs and constant Invite Simulator that is DBD matchmaking. But without them? Not so much. Why? Because very few online players you meet will actually try help you if you get caught at least from my experience and even worse, will make you do all the work getting the generators only to watch you get caught and escape for themselves without doing anything. Kinda defeats the purpose of a Co-op game if there is no cooperation. Also I just want to say that I don't get how this game is meant to be played for beginners. You can't outrun the killer, you can't hide. You literally just keep getting knifed down and hoping you might get saved. Again, this is just my personal opinion. I will still play the game and keep learning the tricks of the trade. But if you're someone new to DBD without friends i'd steer clear for that main reason alone.
Simplemente una obra maestra con actualizaciones constantes un juego en el que tu progresión es fácilmente visible un juego al que hecharle horas para llegar a ser el mejor

but seriously If you are planning to buy this game cause you like horror/survival games this is the best form of horror/survival you can get. (also friday the 13th the game) but we're talking about Dead by Daylight right now!

Un juego de equipos asimétricos con ambiente de terror. En este juego, te pones en la piel de un asesino o de uno de los cuatro supervivientes. Si eres el asesino, has de buscar a los supervivientes, herirlos hasta dejarlos agonizando, y colgarlos de uno de los ganchos que hay esparcidos por el mapa para satisfacer al Ente. Si en cambio eres un superviviente, debes evitar al asesino mientras reparas 5 generadores, luego abrir una de las 2 puertas que te permitirán huir de la partida y sobrevivir a la pesadilla.

Los mapas se generan de forma aleatoria, aunque hay ciertos elementos que siempre se repiten, como una casa con una calabaza en Haddonfield, el taller del desgüace, etc.

Cada personaje (superviviente y asesino) tiene habilidades que le permitirán mejorar sus capacidades, tando de huida, como de caza. Además, cada asesino tiene una capacidad especial que le hace único frente al resto de asesinos.

I really not understand your point.
Firstly, Dead by daylight is a wonderful game, even tough it sucks pretty often, but I would like to recommend it.

But well, with the new patch, I cant.
Dead by daylight has no Goal. Normally, the goal of a game would be to get more people to play it, make that the old and the new players are having fun and balancing so nothing is really OP more very weak.

Firstly they get many new player to play this, obviously.

Second, oh boi, what are you doing?
I want to speak directly to the devs now: A Game needs a skillcap. A skillcap so high that you need hundreds of hours to get it all, the new patch is garbage, removing the difficulty in flashlight und pallet saves is a really really bad idea because not only you are removing a high risk, high reward thing from the game (wasted pallet or wasted flashlight is failed) but also, you are nerfing directly EVERY KILLER. You need to add more Stuff in order to let old players have more fun with it.
Right now its just: you go ingame and do gens or you pallet loop the killer. If you know where every pallet is and if your team saves you, you wont need ANY jukes and with the nurse getting nerfed the last killer hasnt got a chance against it.

But actually thats the third one: Your balancing is bad. Idk whether you are only survivor mains but playing killer sucks. It really does. Killer who arent the nurse (got nerfed) havent got a that high skillcap, and with that not so many posibilitys, to stop the survivors to make gens. Hex:Ruin is a must have in order to get a high rank because without the gens are way to fast done. It was like that already before *1.9.2* but now its even worse. With getting 100%ly out of the killers grasp with a pallet or flashlight save, playing Killer doesnt just suck way more, its also very unlikly to win. It was survivor > Killer and now? Now its Survivor >>>> Killer (?!).
Playing as Survivor makes no fun too, cause of the low skillcap you can achieve.

Freddy is garbage. Why does he have a ability to hinder himself?! Whats the point of that?!?!
I got a few Ideas to change it, but I cant change the fact that killer are much weaker then 4 survivor and the amount of 100% pallet and flashlight saves they have.

Pls devs, balance Killer and survivor and bring me my skillcap back. 360s were so hard to make but so rewarding and you made letherface, the pig, and freddy. Every time I did a flashlight save or a pallet save I was feeling so good but now its so unstatisfying. Every time a did a 3 or 4 K at high rank I was so proud of me, but thats not possible anymore and trying it sucks so hard.
STOP IT.

If the game ever gets his old spirit again I will highly recommend it. Its a nice game with many nice people a very good game idea but sadly a not so good evolution. i dont get the point of making the game less fun for older player to "balance" it.

Nu...co dodat...hrajete za nebožáka,který se snaží bojovat o svůj holý život tím že s ostatníma dalšíma 3 nebožákama nahodí 5 generátorů,otevře bránu a provede to čemu se říká nečekaně "escape".To druhé za co hrajete je naopak narušený jedinec,který se snaží všechny oběti postupně přetáhnout přes rypák a napíchnout je na jeden ze špinavých háčků na maso,aby si entita měla co dát k večeři... :D Všechy postavy lze vylepšit až na tolik že budete po mapách doslova chodit jako na procházce v růžové zahradě :D hra obsahuje také zajímavé data disky,které doporučuji na 100 % zakoupit protože se tím hra stává mnohem větší zábavou :) ale je také třeba brát ohled na to že to není hra typu "pay2win" takže si zahrajete za obě strany (dobra a zla) i bez nich úplně v pohodě ;) no a abych to shrnul tak dávám 9/10 jelikož přece jenom káždá hra má své chybičky ale tady jsou přehlédnutelné ;) kup si a bav se
Simple game but entertaining ;)

Если вы хотите купить эту игру то сразу настройтесь что в ЭТОЙ ИГРЕ МНОГО,МНОГО,МНОГО,МНОГОООООООООООО БАГОВ.Игра действительно привлекает внимание своей идеей НО БАГИ постоянно идут с этой игрой,разработчики пофиксяк часть багов НО с новым обновление приходят новые баги и так постоянно такое чувство что у них руки из жопы растут,взялись за то что делать не умеют.Я пол года не мог играть в игру из-за ошибки подключения к серверам (такая ошибка вылезала в игре),после чего я обратился к разработчика написав им письмо на почту,это было что то....она мне писали типа может у вас антивурус мешает,я им ответил что у меня нет антивируса,потомо начали лечить что типа обновите виндолс,я им кидаю скриншот что у меня лицензия и обновлена вообщем начали спихивать вину  на мой компьютер и кстати пока они фиксили эту проблему успели выпустить пару новых глав(lдополнений)в лучае чего поднимается пару выводов или им похуй на тебя или как я упоминал выше руки из правильного места растут.
К заключению скажу покупать или нет зависит от вашей психики,поскольку от багов будет гореть в одном месте....

キラーで追いかけ回すのが面白そうだと思って購入を決意しました。
しかし、実際には初心者へのひどい煽りが絶えません。
脱出が可能であるのにも関わらず、無意味なチェイスを迫ってきたり、煽りエモーションをしてくるのが目立ちます。
また、マッチングではランク差が開いており、パークが4つついているユーザーの煽り傾向がひどいです。
ベテランユーザーが、いつもは勝てないベテランキラー相手に出来ない煽り行為を、ゆとりを持って余裕で勝てる初心者に出来るので、普段出来ない煽り行為を思う存分に出来ると言ったような感じですね。
相手が3,4人残った状態で脱出ゲートが開いた時は、試合放棄をしたくなるぐらいひどいです。お手上げ状態なのを良いことに煽り放題ですね。脱出ゲート・ハッチ解放時にのみ可能な降参機能が欲しいです。
ですが、悪いところだけではありません。初心者のサバイバーに対する紳士的な態度の素敵なキラーが多いです。
キラーから逃げるのが楽しみたいと言ったユーザーにはとてもオススメ出来ますね。
10/10 whip dab would buy again
10 out of 10 best game out there i would buy this game over and over again swear dbd is love dbd is life <3

- Grindy as hell
- Battlepass is as predatory as in a random free to play game, but it is not free to play
- due to public outrage about the Halloween event being essentially non-existent and instead having been replaced by the battlepass, the developers decided to put the Halloween cosmetics on sale shortly after their release, and are denying refunds / refunding the difference to people who have bought the skins despite the Halloween event being hot garbage. This sale was NOT announced beforehand and those players who supported the developers despite their horrible business practices are now getting screwed over by said business practices

The EULA specifically allows pay-to-win elements to be added to the game.

> The Game may, from time to time, feature virtual goods. Virtual goods include but are not limited to virtual items (characters, accessories, items such as “character customization”, power-ups), points, credits, tokens and currency (collectively, “Virtual Goods”) for use in the Game.

The EULA is being used as an excuse to shut down anyone who complains about not being refunded the difference of the Halloween skins. The same EULA will be used when the developers inevitably add pay-to-win elements to the game.

Stay far, far away from this game. It is absolutely not worth getting into and the only reason to play this game in its current state is if you have already invested significant amounts of time into it and therefore don't have to deal with the insane grind as much as new players.

Half fun, half fustrating.

Playing as the surviver is realy fun, though sometimes the killers zone in on me like they have heat seeking vision, though you can find a way around it. getting out of their line of sight, or seeting a trap, realy fun, and would recomend.

Plying as the killer, nothing but fustration. every time I play the killer, I get toyed with, littraly the survivors running in front of me to bait me. Cant catch up with them, or cant find them. half the time it becomes a game of round robbin as the others get the genoraters, every time. and when I do cantch up to them, I cant hit them. when I do hit them, they run and get emidiatly held, I dont know what it is, but every time I play a killer, I'm a shark fighting dolfins, and is just no fun at all.
It spills out our fantasies of trying to murder someone and trying to not get murdered by someone.
